name: Hyperspace: Andy's Adventure
description: Hyperspace : Andy’s Adventure is a 3D casual game inspired by retro arcade games. It offers you a rich content with more than 30 different levels. Also, If you complete all the levels that we offer, you can adjust your own level parametrically for your own taste. During its addictive game play, a beautiful soundtrack inspired by 80's synth-wave will go along all the way with you. Hyperspace will quickly become one of your favourite games with its easy-to-learn, hard-to-master approach, stunning visuals and true speed feeling. Hyperspace is a single player space adventure that anyone who can rely on their reflexes can play! Now, sit back, put on your headphones and get ready for the challenge!
